booking.title: Book Your Free Consultation
booking.description: Start your project with a free consultation to get you started on the right foot. Use the Google Meet link provided with your booking to join the meeting at the time of your appointment.

placeholder.title: Ready to Serve You
placeholder.description: For booking or inquiries, please contact us via phone or email

info.title: What to Expect
info.point2: Via Google Meet (link sent after booking)
info.point3: Free legal consultation with our experts
info.point4: Immediate answers to your legal inquiries
